summary: This is an email chain from March 26, 2021, discussing a 'friendly subpoena' to be sent to an attorney (MI) to obtain a copy of a settlement agreement between a victim (CV) and Jeffrey Epstein. The agreement resolved a 2009 civil suit and is considered relevant to the investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell's participation in abuse.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Recipient of an email discussing the need for a subpoena to obtain a settlement agreement related to the Epstein case. She is a prosecutor with the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The defendant in a 2009 civil suit filed by CV, which was resolved by a settlement agreement. His abuse is central to the ongoing investigation.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of an ongoing investigation into her participation in the abuse of CV and other underage girls, for which the settlement agreement is considered relevant evidence.

connections.description: CV filed a 2009 civil suit against Jeffrey Epstein, which was resolved via a settlement agreement.
The investigation is into Maxwell's participation in the abuse of CV and other underage girls.
MI is an attorney who possesses the settlement agreement from CV's civil case against Epstein.
Strauss's office is seeking to issue a 'friendly subpoena' to attorney MI to obtain the settlement agreement for their investigation.

events.title: Civil Suit Filed by CV
events.description: CV filed a civil lawsuit against Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Settlement Agreement Reached
events.description: The 2009 civil suit between CV and Jeffrey Epstein was resolved via a settlement agreement.

events.title: Discussion of Friendly Subpoena
events.description: Prosecutors discuss sending a 'friendly subpoena' to attorney MI to obtain the 2009 settlement agreement for the ongoing investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: A 2009 civil suit filed by victim CV against Jeffrey Epstein was resolved via a confidential settlement agreement.
Attorney MI possesses a copy of this settlement agreement but believes he requires a subpoena to provide it to prosecutors.
The settlement agreement is considered directly relevant to the ongoing investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell's participation in the abuse of CV and other underage girls.
The communication is a 2021 email discussing legal strategy to obtain this evidence, indicating the settlement's importance years after the original case.
MI's firm had already voluntarily provided all other court filings and deposition transcripts from the 2009 civil case.
